verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلطُّورِ

translations.text: By Mount Ṭûr!<sup foot_note=77430>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wattoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ

translations.text: And by the Book written
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakitabin mastoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ

translations.text: on open pages ˹for all to read˺!<sup foot_note=77431>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fee raqqin manshoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ

translations.text: And by the ˹Sacred˺ House frequently visited!<sup foot_note=77432>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walbayti almaAAmoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ

translations.text: And by the canopy raised ˹high˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wassaqfi almarfooAA
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ

translations.text: And by the seas set on fire!<sup foot_note=77433>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walbahri almasjoor
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ

translations.text: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will come to pass—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna AAathaba rabbika lawaqiAA
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ

translations.text: none will avert it—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma lahu min dafiAA
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا

translations.text: on the Day the heavens will be shaken violently,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma tamooru assamao mawra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا

translations.text: and the mountains will be blown away entirely.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wataseeru aljibalu sayra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.text: Then woe on that Day to the deniers—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fawaylun yawma-ithin lilmukaththibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ

translations.text: those who amuse themselves with falsehood!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena hum fee khawdinyalAAaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

translations.text: ˹It is˺ the Day they will be fiercely shoved into the Fire of Hell.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma yudaAAAAoona ila narijahannama daAAAAa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.text: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Fire which you used to deny.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hathihi annaru allateekuntum biha tukaththiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.text: Is this magic, or do you not see?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afasihrun hatha am antum latubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: Burn in it! It is the same whether you endure ˹it˺ patiently or not.<sup foot_note=77434>1</sup> You are only rewarded for what you used to do.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Islawha fasbirooaw la tasbiroo sawaon AAalaykum innamatujzawna ma kuntum taAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ

translations.text: Indeed, the righteous will be in Gardens and bliss,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatinwanaAAeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.text: enjoying whatever their Lord will have granted them. And their Lord will have protected them from the torment of the Hellfire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakiheena bima atahumrabbuhum wawaqahum rabbuhum AAathaba aljaheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kuloo washraboo hanee-an bimakuntum taAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ

translations.text: They will be reclining on thrones, ˹neatly˺ lined up ˹facing each other˺. And We will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Muttaki-eena AAala sururin masfoofatinwazawwajnahum bihoorin AAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ

translations.text: As for those who believe and whose descendants follow them in faith, We will elevate their descendants to their rank, never discounting anything ˹of the reward˺ of their deeds. Every person will reap only what they sowed.<sup foot_note=77435>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallatheena amanoo wattabaAAat-humthurriyyatuhum bi-eemanin alhaqnabihim thurriyyatahum wama alatnahum minAAamalihim min shay-in kullu imri-in bima kasaba raheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ

translations.text: And We will ˹continually˺ provide them with whatever fruit or meat they desire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waamdadnahum bifakihatin walahminmimma yashtahoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ

translation.text: They will pass to one another

translations.text: They will pass around to each other a drink ˹of pure wine,˺ which leads to no idle talk or sinfulness.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: YatanazaAAoona feeha ka/san lalaghwun feeha wala ta/theem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ

translations.text: And they will be waited on by their youthful servants like spotless pearls.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayatoofu AAalayhim ghilmanunlahum kaannahum lu/luon maknoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

translations.text: They will turn to one another inquisitively.<sup foot_note=77436>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdinyatasaaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ

translations.text: They will say, “Before ˹this reward˺ we used to be in awe ˹of Allah˺ in the midst of our people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo inna kunna qablufee ahlina mushfiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

translations.text: So Allah has graced us and protected us from the torment of ˹Hell’s˺ scorching heat.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Famanna Allahu AAalayna wawaqanaAAathaba assamoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

translations.text: Indeed, we used to call upon Him ˹alone˺ before. He is truly the Most Kind, Most Merciful.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna kunna min qablu nadAAoohuinnahu huwa albarru arraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ

translations.text: So ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺. For you, by the grace of your Lord, are not a fortune-teller or a madman.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fathakkir fama anta biniAAmatirabbika bikahin wala majnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ

translations.text: Or do they say, “˹He is˺ a poet, for whom we ˹eagerly˺ await an ill-fate!”?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am yaqooloona shaAAirun natarabbasubihi rayba almanoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

translations.text: Say, “Keep waiting! I too am waiting with you.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul tarabbasoo fa-innee maAAakum minaalmutarabbiseen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ

translations.text: Or do their ˹intelligent˺ minds prompt them to this ˹paradox˺?<sup foot_note=77437>1</sup> Or are they ˹just˺ a transgressing people?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am ta/muruhum ahlamuhum bihathaam hum qawmun taghoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: Or do they say, “He made this ˹Quran˺ up!”? In fact, they have no faith.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am yaqooloona taqawwalahu bal layu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ

translations.text: Let them then produce something like it, if what they say is true!<sup foot_note=77438>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falya/too bihadeethin mithlihi in kanoosadiqeena
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ

translations.text: Or were they created by nothing, or are they ˹their own˺ creators?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am khuliqoo min ghayri shay-in am humu alkhaliqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

translations.text: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? In fact, they have no certainty.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am khalaqoo assamawatiwal-arda bal la yooqinoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ

translations.text: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord, or are they in control ˹of everything˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am AAindahum khaza-inu rabbika amhumu almusaytiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: Or do they have a stairway, by which they eavesdrop ˹on the heavens˺? Then let those who do so bring a compelling proof.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lahum sullamun yastamiAAoona feehifalya/ti mustamiAAuhum bisultanin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ

translations.text: Or does He have daughters ˹as you claim˺, while you ˹prefer to˺ have sons?<sup foot_note=77439>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lahu albanatu walakumu albanoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ

translations.text: Or are you ˹O Prophet˺ asking them for a reward ˹for the message˺ so that they are overburdened by debt?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am tas-aluhum ajran fahum min maghraminmuthqaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ

translations.text: Or do they have access to ˹the Record in˺ the unseen, so they copy it ˹for all to see˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am AAindahumu alghaybu fahum yaktuboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ

translations.text: Or do they intend to scheme ˹against the Prophet˺? Then it is the disbelievers who will fall victim to ˹their˺ schemes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am yureedoona kaydan fallatheenakafaroo humu almakeedoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

translations.text: Or do they have a god other than Allah? Glorified is Allah far above what they associate ˹with Him˺!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lahum ilahun ghayru Allahisubhana Allahi AAamma yushrikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ

translations.text: If they were to see a ˹deadly˺ piece of the sky fall down ˹upon them˺, still they would say, “˹This is just˺ a pile of clouds.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in yaraw kisfan mina assama-isaqitan yaqooloo sahabun markoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ

translations.text: So leave them until they face their Day in which they will be struck dead—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatharhum hatta yulaqooyawmahumu allathee feehi yusAAaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ

translations.text: the Day their scheming will be of no benefit to them whatsoever, nor will they be helped.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma la yughnee AAanhum kayduhumshay-an wala hum yunsaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: Also, the wrongdoers will certainly have another torment before that ˹Day˺, but most of them do not know.<sup foot_note=77440>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lillatheena thalamooAAathaban doona thalika walakinna aktharahumla yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ

translations.text: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, for you are truly under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes. And glorify the praises of your Lord when you rise.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wasbir lihukmi rabbikafa-innaka bi-aAAyunina wasabbih bihamdirabbika heena taqoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ

translations.text: And glorify Him during part of the night and at the fading of the stars.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamina allayli fasabbihhu wa-idbaraannujoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
